title: Semen Datsenko
text:
Semen Datsenko (; born 10 May 1994 in <a href="Poltava">Poltava</a>, <a href="Poltava%20Oblast">Poltava Oblast</a>, <a href="Ukraine">Ukraine</a>) is a <a href="professional">professional</a> <a href="Ukraine">Ukrainian</a> <a href="football%20%28association%29">football</a> <a href="Defender%20%28association%20football%29">defender</a> who plays for <a href="FC%20Trostianets">FC Trostianets</a>.
Career.
Datsenko attended the Sportive youth school of FC Metalist Kharkiv. He made his debut for <a href="SC%20Tavriya%20Simferopol">SC Tavriya Simferopol</a> played in the main-squad team against <a href="FC%20Volyn%20Lutsk">FC Volyn Lutsk</a> on 21 July 2013 in <a href="Ukrainian%20Premier%20League">Ukrainian Premier League</a>.
